mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS bidId, bidder_id, u.nickname AS bidderNickName, ta.poster_url AS bidderProfileFilePath, bid_amount, is_highest FROM bid b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.bidder_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tmdb_anime ta ON ta.id = u.liked_anime_id1 WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId} ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;

SELECT g.seller_id, g.start_price, g.instant_buy_price, b.id AS bidId, b.bidder_id, b.bid_amount AS currentBidAmount FROM goods g LEFT JOIN bid b ON b.goods_id = g.id AND b.is_highest IS TRUE WHERE g.id = #{goodsId} AND g.auction_status IN ('WAIT', 'PROCEEDING') AND g.deleted_at IS NULL FOR UPDATE;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wallet_history ( wallet_id, goods_id, transaction_type, amount, description ) VALUES ( (SELECT id FROM coin_wallet WHERE user_id = #{userId}), #{goodsId}, #{transactionType}, #{amount}, CONCAT((select title from goods where id = #{goodsId}), ' ', #{description}) );
INSERT INTO bid (goods_id, bidder_id, bid_amount, is_highest) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{bidderId}, #{bidAmount}, true)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods WHERE auction_end_at <= NOW() AND auction_status IN ('WAIT', 'PROCEEDING') AND deleted_at IS NULL
